info.title: Badgr
info.description: Organizations around the world use Badgr to create branded learning ecosystems that support their communities with skills-based digital credentials, stackable learning pathways, and portable learner records.

revocationReason.description: Short description of why the Assertion was revoked

openBadgeId.description: URL of the OpenBadge compliant json

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the BadgeClass was created

issuer.description: entityId of the Issuer who owns the BadgeClass

image.description: Base64 encoded string of an image that represents the BadgeClass.

criteriaUrl.description: External URL that describes in a human-readable format the criteria for the BadgeClass

criteriaNarrative.description: Markdown formatted description of the criteria

alignments.description: List of objects describing objectives or educational standards

tags.description: List of tags that describe the BadgeClass

BadgeClassExpiration.description: Expiration period for Assertions awarded from this BadgeClass

BadgeRecipient.description: Recipient that was issued the Assertion

identity.description: Either the hash of the identity or the plaintext value

hashed.description: Whether or not the identity value is hashed.

type.description: Type of identifier used to identify recipient

salt.description: An optional salt used in producing the hashed identity if hashed

email.description: Email address associated with a BadgeUser

verified.description: True if the email address has been verified

primary.description: True for a single email address to receive email notifications

token.description: Access token to use in the Authorization header

share_url.description: A public URL for sharing the Collection. Read only.

shareHash.description: The share hash that allows construction of a public sharing URL. Read only.

published.description: True if the Collection has a public share URL

assertions.description: List of Assertions in the collection

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the Collection was created

openBadgeId.description: URL of the OpenBadge compliant json

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the Issuer was created

image.description: Base64 encoded string of an image that represents the Issuer

url.description: Homepage or website associated with the Issuer
